resources.string:
You are using USAF PFA Calc - a simple, fast, easy to use utility for calculating scores for the United States Air Force Fitness Assessment. I created this app because none of the other similar apps on the market suited my tastes.

If you want to know more about the Air Force Fitness Assessment, check out the official page.

USAF PFA Calc is licensed under the MIT license. If you want to see the code for this project, check it out on GitHub.

Copyright © 2013, 2021 Mark O. Busby
